title: World’s worst DoS attack?
author: VD
content_html: Check out Sitemeter.  This is odd.  I’m getting about 4x more page views per visitor than is customary… and it’s not everyone hitting refresh like a coke-addled rat in a science lab.
content_text:
Check out
Sitemeter
.  This is odd.  I’m getting about 4x more page views per visitor than is customary… and it’s not everyone hitting refresh like a coke-addled rat in a science lab.
